body_html: Forgive me if I'm missing something obvious, but why wasn't this feature ever merged? It seems like it would be useful to obtain parity between the interfaces for all of the pooling functions.

body: Forgive me if I'm missing something obvious, but why wasn't this feature ever merged? It seems like it would be useful to obtain parity between the interfaces for all of the pooling functions.
